verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen,<s%> O <S%H339>isles,<s%> to me; and <S%H7181>listen,<s%> you <S%H3816>people,<s%> from <S%H7350>far;<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb;<s%> from the <S%H4578>bowels<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%> has he made <S%H2142>mention<s%> of my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And he has <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> like a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword;<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand<s%> has he <S%H2244>hid<s%> me, and <S%H7760>made<s%> me a <S%H1305>polished<s%> <S%H2671>shaft;<s%> in his <S%H827>quiver<s%> has he <S%H5641>hid<s%> me;
And <S%H559>said<s%> to me, You are my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> I will be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H3021>labored<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> I have <S%H3615>spent<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> for <S%H8414>nothing,<s%> and in <S%H1892>vain:<s%> yet <S%H403>surely<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is with the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and my <S%H6468>work<s%> with my <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to be his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to him, Though <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be not <S%H622>gathered,<s%> yet shall I be <S%H3513>glorious<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and my <S%H430>God<s%> shall be my <S%H5797>strength.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> It is a <S%H7043>light<s%> thing that you should be my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5336>preserved<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> you for a <S%H216>light<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> that you may be my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One, to him whom <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H960>despises,<s%> to him whom the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H8581>abhors,<s%> to a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers,<s%> <S%H4428>Kings<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> also shall <S%H7812>worship,<s%> <S%H4616>because<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that is <S%H539>faithful,<s%> and the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> you.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> In an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> have I <S%H6030>heard<s%> you, and in a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> have I <S%H5826>helped<s%> you: and I will <S%H5341>preserve<s%> you, and <S%H5414>give<s%> you for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to cause to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H8076>desolate<s%> <S%H5159>heritages;<s%>

That you may <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H631>prisoners,<s%> <S%H3318>Go<s%> <S%H3318>forth;<s%> to them that are in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H1540>Show<s%> yourselves. They shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and their <S%H4830>pastures<s%> shall be in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8205>high<s%> places.

They shall not <S%H7456>hunger<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6770>thirst;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H8273>heat<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> them: for he that has <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> them, even by the <S%H4002>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> shall he <S%H5095>guide<s%> them.
And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H1870>way,<s%> and my <S%H4546>highways<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far:<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> and from the <S%H3220>west;<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5515>Sinim.<s%>

<S%H7442>Sing,<s%> O <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and be <S%H1523>joyful,<s%> O <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H6476>break<s%> forth into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> O <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on his <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>
But <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and my <S%H136>Lord<s%> has <S%H7913>forgotten<s%> me.

Can a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her <S%H5764>sucking<s%> child, that she should not have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of her <S%H990>womb?<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they may <S%H7911>forget,<s%> yet will I not <S%H7911>forget<s%> you.
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H2710>graven<s%> you on the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands;<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%> are <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.
Your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall make <S%H4116>haste;<s%> your <S%H2040>destroyers<s%> and they that made you <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> of you.

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and <S%H7200>behold:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these <S%H6908>gather<s%> themselves together, and <S%H935>come<s%> to you. As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you with them <S%H3605>all,<s%> as with an <S%H5716>ornament,<s%> and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them on you, as a <S%H3618>bride<s%> does.

For your <S%H2723>waste<s%> and your <S%H8074>desolate<s%> places, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H2035>destruction,<s%> shall <S%H3588>even<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> be too <S%H3334>narrow<s%> by reason of the <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> and they that <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> you up shall be <S%H7368>far<s%> away.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> which you shall have, after you have <S%H7923>lost<s%> the other, shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> in your <S%H241>ears,<s%> The <S%H4725>place<s%> is too <S%H6862>strait<s%> for me: <S%H5066>give<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> to me that I may <S%H3427>dwell.<s%>

Then shall you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H3205>begotten<s%> me <S%H428>these,<s%> seeing I have <S%H7908>lost<s%> my children, and am <S%H1565>desolate,<s%> a <S%H1473>captive,<s%> and <S%H5493>removing<s%> to and fro? and <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H1431>brought<s%> up <S%H2004>these?<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I was <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> <S%H375>where<s%> had they been?

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and <S%H7311>set<s%> up my <S%H5251>standard<s%> to the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> in their <S%H2684>arms,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> on their <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

And <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be your <S%H539>nursing<s%> fathers, and their <S%H8282>queens<s%> your <S%H3243>nursing<s%> mothers: they shall <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to you with their <S%H639>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3897>lick<s%> up the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for they shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> that <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me.
Shall the <S%H4455>prey<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> or the <S%H6662>lawful<s%> <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H4422>delivered?<s%>

But <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall be <S%H3947>taken<s%> away, and the <S%H4455>prey<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered:<s%> for I will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with him that <S%H3401>contends<s%> with you, and I will <S%H3467>save<s%> your <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And I will <S%H398>feed<s%> them that <S%H3238>oppress<s%> you with their own <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and they shall be <S%H7937>drunken<s%> with their own <S%H1818>blood,<s%> as with <S%H6071>sweet<s%> <S%H6071>wine:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am your <S%H3467>Savior<s%> and your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the <S%H46>mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
